name: C++ & Directx3D Graphics Demo (Prototype)
description:
A graphics prototype using C++, Directx3D and a basic university framework. 

The application makes use of bloom, normal mapping, displacement mapping, dynamic texturing, post processing (bloom), multiple lights (spot lights, point lights and a directional light), shadows & tessellation.

A report on the project can be found in the downloaded files - this includes some basic instructional info.

Unfortunately, full source code cannot be provided as it uses some Abertay University provided code.
